message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900,000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you coming down to $900,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to go as high as $800,000 right now. Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $800,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $850,000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.
